title: [Self-Directed] Adaptive Learning Strategies for Customized Learning Path Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in utilizing digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining online platform-based personalized learning path design with face-to-face sessions

learning_goals: Learners can analyze their learning profiles and derive personalized learning requirements.
Learners can construct optimal learning pathways based on content models provided by a recommendation system.
Learners can monitor and adjust their learning progress using adaptive learning tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
